Reviews.Title: Good phone not great for USA
Reviews.Author: Raja A. Raza
Reviews.Content: It is very good built, and feel good in your hand. It comes with Xiaomi version of Android that is not for US users.You cannot use the phone and internet at the same time. There may be some setting that I cannot find.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic device, speedy, gorgeorous screen, great sound, and wonderful battery life.
Reviews.Author: tabby
Reviews.Content: Reviewed here is the Tegra 4 version.This xiaomi mi3 is the first phone to sport the snappy tegra 4 chip. I have both this and the nexus 5. Compared to the nexus 5, this device is a bit longer, and slightly wider, probably to house the larger battery. The screen is very comparable to the nexus 5 screen. The xiaomi OS is slightly different from regular Android OS, as it is somewhat a blend between Android and IOS. So far it has been an easy learning curve and the OS has been a real joy to use. Xiaomi also regularly releases bug fixes to the OS every Friday.Pros vs the nexus 5:-CPU appears marginally faster-better GPU for gaming-improved battery life over nexus 5-better button placement (IMHO)-better speakers-slightly longer screen as nexus 5 uses some of the screen for the back/details buttons, while the xiaomi mi3 does not use any screen space for the back/details buttonsCons:-camera does not OIS, thus not as good for low light shots-larger phone than nexus 5All in all, both phones are fantastic. My significant other holds the nexus 5 while I'm using the xiaomi mi3.
